Title: Rock-A-Doodle
Director: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman(co-director), Dan Kuenster(co-director)
Writer: Don Bluth (story), John Pomeroy (story), David J. Steinberg (story), David N. Weiss (story), T.J. Kuenster (story), Gary Goldman (story), David N. Weiss (screenplay)
Actors: Phil Harris, Glen Campbell, Eddie Deezen, Kathryn Holcomb
Plot: In order to defeat the Grand Duke of Owls, a young boy transformed into a cat teams up with a group of barnyard animals to find a rooster who can raise the sun.
